bags.name: Toast Bag
bags.lore: A surprisingly resilient bag woven from slices of magically preserved toast. Smells faintly of butter.
bags.ability: Provides a minor (3%) resistance to Frost damage.

bags.name: Lettuce Satchel
bags.lore: Made from thick, leafy green lettuce. It has a surprisingly large capacity, but must be kept hydrated.
bags.ability: Grants a small boost to Stamina regeneration while outdoors.

bags.name: Hunter's Pouch
bags.lore: A durable pouch crafted from the tanned hides and pelts of tundra beasts. Excellent for keeping supplies dry.
bags.ability: Automatically chills any liquid items placed inside.

bags.name: Steampunk Crate-Pack
bags.lore: A clunky, mechanical bag featuring brass gears and small steam vents. Heavy, but highly protective.
bags.ability: Minor passive defense bonus due to the thick metal casing.

bags.name: Marble Sack
bags.lore: Originally intended for holding glass marbles, this small sack is surprisingly sturdy and bottomless.
bags.ability: Increases the chance of finding valuable gems or rare crafting components.

bags.name: Stained Glass Lantern Bag
bags.lore: A beautifully repurposed lantern whose glass panels now protect contents. Casts colorful light when opened.
bags.ability: Emits a weak, continuous Light spell.

bags.name: Tesla Coil Battery Bag
bags.lore: A backpack housing a small, crackling tesla coil battery. Be cautious when touching the metal frame!
bags.ability: Occasionally zaps nearby enemies for minor electrical damage.

bags.name: Raging Raptor Backpack
bags.lore: A plush, dinosaur-themed backpack. Hug it for courage, but try not to confuse it with a pet.
bags.ability: Provides minor morale boost to allies when worn.

bags.name: Messenger Bag
bags.lore: A classic, sturdy leather bag used for rapid deliveries, enchanted for speed and efficiency.
bags.ability: Slightly increases the wearer's movement speed.

bags.name: Magic Scholar's College Bag
bags.lore: Used by aspiring scholars at the North Pole Academy. Has hidden compartments for dangerous experiments.
bags.ability: Reduces the weight of all scrolls and books by 75%.
